## Description {#details}

A binary fraction with an explicit integer bit.

The significand must be at least one bit wider than the target precision.

Definition at line 778 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/apfloat-h">APFloat.h</a>.
